#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<list>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#define pi pair<int,int>
#define vi vector<int>
#define mp make_pair
#define Min(a,b)((a<b)?a:b)
#define Max(a,b)((a>b)?a:b)
#define Swap(a,b)(a=b+a-(b=a))
#define sfd(d) scanf("%d",&d)
#define sff(d) scanf("%f",&d)
#define sfc(ch) scanf("%c",&ch)
#define sfs(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define pfd(d) printf("%d",d)
#define el putchar('\n')
#define sp putchar(' ')
#define Fill(a,val) memset(a,val,sizeof a)
#define pb push_back
#define INF 123456789
#define mod 1000000
#define ll long long int
#define si short int
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;char ch;
    cin>>t;getchar();
    while(t--){
            int c = 1;bool blank = 1;
        while((ch = getchar())!='\n'){
            if(ch == ' ') ++c;
            blank = 0;
        }
        if (blank ) --c;
        cout<<c;el;
    }
}
